Text:
Thanks alot!

Dream Theater really did a good job with A Nightmare To Remember and The Count of Tuscan.

This album is SUPERB! Im rating 5 albums of dream theater "the BEST" review:

1. Octavarium
2. Systematic Chaos
3. Black Clouds & Silver Linings
4. Metropolis Pt. 2: Scenes From A Memory
5. Train Of Thought
